description: The project's success is heavily reliant on a single DevOps Lead for all critical Infrastructure-as-Code and CI/CD work, creating a project bottleneck and single point of failure.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate pair programming for all critical infrastructure tasks. Formally cross-train the Backend Developer on CI/CD pipeline maintenance and basic Terraform administration.
contingency_plan: Pre-approve a contract with a third-party DevOps consulting firm for emergency support.
monitoring_trigger: DevOps tasks show >30% schedule variance. DevOps Lead has unplanned absence of >2 days.

description: Senior Frontend Developer 1 is allocated at 133% capacity in Sprint 1, creating a high risk of burnout, reduced code quality, and task spillover into subsequent sprints.
mitigation_strategy: Rebalance Sprint 1 workload. Transfer STORY-070 to Frontend Developer 2. Decompose STORY-061 into smaller, parallelizable sub-tasks that can be shared between both frontend developers.
contingency_plan: Authorize overtime for Sprint 1 if rebalancing is not possible. Accept schedule slip for non-critical Sprint 1 tasks.
monitoring_trigger: Sprint 1 burndown chart shows significant deviation from the ideal line after Day 3.
